action.text: declare @execute nvarchar(4000), @p varchar(32) select @suggestionCode = left(@suggestionCode, 32), @suggestionTable = left(@suggestionTable, 64), @p = '%[^0-9_A-Za-z]%' if patindex(@p, @suggestionCode) > 0 or patindex(@p, @suggestionTable) > 0 return select @execute = 'select top 1 rtrim(%s1) as %s1 from %s2 where right(rtrim(%s1), 1) between ''0'' and ''9'' and %s1 like ''%s3%'' order by len(rtrim(%s1)), %s1 desc' select @execute = replace(replace(replace(@execute, '%s1', @suggestionCode), '%s2', @suggestionTable), '%s3', replace(rtrim(@suggestionValue), '''', '''''')) exec sp_executesql @execute
